about_the_game:
This is an exciting leisure game, which brings players the opportunity to watch and participate in animal race. Using VR technology, players are on a runway arena, and they will enjoy the fierce competitions of animals.



In the game, there are 6 different animals to choose from, including dinosaurs, brown bears, birds, etc. Each animal has its own unique characteristics and speed. Players can sort and combine these animals according to their preferences and strategies to predict the results of the game and bet on the results. In the game, you can also freely switch between the perspective and direction of the animals. Whether it is a competitive enthusiast who pursue speed or the quiet audience who likes to watch the scenery, you can find your own fun in the game. After each game, according to the player's guess results, the system will calculate the bets won by the player based on the odds.
Put on the VR device, join the world where the animals race, and run with various magical animals!



Operation method:
Confirm the right handle trigger button

name: Animal Race Run VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE

short_description: This is an exciting leisure game, which brings players the opportunity to watch and participate in animal race. Using VR technology, players are on a runway arena, and they will enjoy the fierce competitions of animals.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
